title: FamilyManager
description: Application that allows users to compile a list of household tasks for their family.  Tasks can be presented by user, project, or due date.  This app also allows users to keep track of monthly/weekly expenses.

title: Random Recipe Generator
description: Application that returns recipes to user based on ingredient selection, then allows them to save favorite recipes and search for nearby grocery stores.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Application that returns accurate current and forecasted weather data based on user city search. Allows user to save and recall weather data from previous search history.

title: Reactive Employee Directory
description: Human Resources and Employee Management system developed using React.js library.  Allows user to sort by age and filter employees by last name.

title: Code Quiz
description: A simple multiple choice quiz that tests users basic JavaScript knowledge.  Score are calculated and stored using time remaining and questions answered correctly.

title: Secure Password Generator
description: Password generating application that provides random collection of characters to user based on criteria input.
